name: One Minute At Cube's
description:
A horrorish game where you have to use a flashlight to track the whereabouts of an evil cube that will stop at nothing to kill you. Sort of like five nights at Freddy's

You have one minute to survive.

HOW TO PLAY:

use WASD to move your camera

use SPACE to turn off/on your light

use your light to find the cube and stop it from killing you

using your light results in losing power and so does moving around

if your power is at zero you die

Submitted for the one minute game jam
